title: Monster Cowboy
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 308 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 500L, Fiction Series
description: Monster Cowboy is a story about making a friend's dreams come true. In this story Lurk wants to be a cowboy. His friends surprise him with a visit to a farm to ride a horse. Unfortunately the horses at the farm are too small for Lurk to ride. Lurk's friends find another way for Lurk to ride horses.
reviewWords: boots, cowboy, horse, saddle, trail, woods
phonics: Diphthongs : Associate the letter oy with the sound /oy/
